directions: Stir corn, sour cream, mayonnaise, Cheddar cheese, and onion together until evenly mixed.
ingredients: 2 (11 ounce) cans corn with red and green peppers (such as Green Giant® Mexicorn®), drained
2 tablespoons shredded extra-sharp Cheddar cheese, or to taste
1 teaspoon grated onion, or to taste
title: Mexican Chip Dip
